page.title: 16SCORTON SHOPS
page.content:
In Scorton there are two small shops.Both sell all kinds of food, and one has a post office.The shop called Mace,overlooking the village green, is open from half past eight in the morning until half past five, but on Sundays only from eleven until twelve o'clock.The owner,Mr.Rawling, is always there and three other people take turns to help him.
SHOPPING FROM A CATALOGUE We usually get clothes, shoes and sometimes toys out of the catalogue. A man comes round every Monday and he writes down the order.You can pay him off at once but this is hard if you order something expensive.Mum pays it off bit by bit, so she is always paying him.
